2.4 final

Woo!

title: Cases 62 & 64
message:
Cases 62 & 64

- Removed (commented out) Notey Pro.  All features are now free for
everyone.
- Implemented Cyanogen SDK to enable option for quick tile.
- Bug fix where light theme Info Screen would show instead of dark
theme.

Closes #62 & #64

title: Case 45
message:
Case 45

More Material UI stuff.

Case #45. Closes #61.

title: Case 43
message:
Case 43

Added the new icons for dashclock.

#43

title: Case 60
message:
Case 60

Removed navigationBarColor per Material Design guidelines.

https://developer.android.com/training/material/theme.html
"When you customize the navigation and status bars, either make them
both transparent or modify only the status bar. The navigation bar
should remain black in all other cases."

Case #60

title: Case 57
message:
Case 57

- Added Crashlytics (http://try.crashlytics.com/sdk-android/) library
for automatic crash reporting.  Internet permission required for
Crashlytics.
- Upped minSdk to 15 to use MaterialRipple library.
- Also bug fix for repeating alarm not being saved after undo
notification was restored.

Closes #57.

title: Case 60
message:
Case 60

- Fixed main and infoscreen activity toolbar (better spacing for kk and
below, also alligned Notey text and menu button)
- Materialized Settings and About pages.
- Fixed Settings/About back arrows.
- Cleaned up Settings theme picker FAB onclicklisteners
- Removed "Calligraphy" library.
- Misc fixes from previous cases.

Closes #60.

title: Case 59
message:
Case 59

Popup to show the pro features.

Closes #59.

title: Case 8
message:
Case 8

Undo notification delete.  When a user removes a notification, a 5
second long notification will take it's place to all the user to restore
it.  Moved the notification build methods to a new BroadcastReciever
called NotificationBuild.

Closes #8

- Probably some other stuff.

Closes #43, #55, & #56

message:
Case 42

For Lollipop devices, use proper material design notification style.

used for Info Screen too.  Also increased the info screen icon size from
24dp to 36dp.

title: Case 27
message:
Case 27

Do not vibrate during priority mode. Achieved by using
NotificationManager to create a notification which only vibrates.  Once
InfoActivity starts, one second later the vibrate only notification
cancels.

Not the final v2.1 release.
